author: Emily Angle
method: Put all the ingredients in a food mixer and blend together. (If you have time, soak the oats in the clementine juice for 10 minutes to soften them for a super smooth smoothie.)
ingredients: 180ml/6fl oz clementine juice,  40g/1½oz porridge oats (not rolled oats),  320g/11oz frozen blueberries,  2 ripe pears, peeled,  1 tbsp honey,  ½ tsp mixed spice
